hanzi-su-wiki:
酵

Значения

Дрожжи, закваска

Мнемоника

В древнем Китае о стариках заботился старший сын. Сыновний долг 孝 в вине 酉 (сохранение его качества) выполняют дрожжи. Сколько бы раз не вносилась закваска, вкус вина остается неизменным.

yeast; leavening; fermentation; Taiwan pr. [xiao4]
дрожжи; закваска; ферментация; Тайвань пр. [xiao4]
rtega_mnemonic:
酵酵RSyeast, leaven, fermentation
  • left in a jar 酉 to grow up (ferment) to be an old man 孝: yeast
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 孝 indicates the sound; 酉 (wine) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
发酵 [ fā jiào ]: to ferment; fermentation
酵母 [ jiào mǔ ]: leaven; yeast
酵母菌 [ jiào mǔ jūn ]: yeast; mold
酵母醇 [ jiào mǔ chún ]: zymosterol
酵解作用 [ jiào jiě zuò yòng ]: zymolysis
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 酉 [ yǒu ] wine; wine vessel; chemical
    • 孝 [ xiào ] filial piety, obedience; mourning
heisig_constituent: fermentation, whiskey bottle, filial piety, old man, child
koohiiStory1: The secrets of fermentation are passed to the son who displays the most filial piety.
koohiiStory2: Since filial piety is all about respecting ones elders, and the older a whiskey bottle is (i.e. the time it have spent undergoing fermentation) the more respect you should give it, the meaning of this kanji becomes clear. If it doesn´t, sink back some whiskey and it will.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Alcohol is a good teacher on the process of fermentation.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Because alcohol is so good and addicting, people will work extra hard to ferment it properly. This makes it a good teacher to learn about fermentation. People are motivated to figure it out!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Using fermentation, you are indeed making some alcohol. It will be drunk at a party put on by Emperor こういち.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: You are fermenting thousands of bottles of alcohol for Emperor こういち's big party.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you feel filial piety (孝) towards the sake flask (酉) when it's fermented
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " unitary ", " filial piety " sound. The original meaning is wine yeast, and later refers to yeast. "Guang Yun. Suburban rhyme: "Yeast, wine yeast." Such as "Qi Min Yao Shu. Raising Sheep": "Making horse cheese fermentation method: use two or three liters of donkey milk, and horse milk, no limit. The cheese is made, the cake is removed, the dough is exposed, and it is dried. It is also used as leaven in the later years. ""Compendium of Materia Medica. Valleybe. Brewing category. Steamed cakes: "Wheat noodles are repaired and cured, but the steamed cakes are the oldest. They are made from fermented fermented grains on a single side. They are needed for pills and can cure diseases. The herbal medicine does not contain them.

" Yeast " also means fermentation. "Zhengzitong. "Youbu": "Yobi, fermented with wine." Such as "Golden History. Shihuo Zhi 4: "If you scrape the soil and decoct it, pick yellow ear grass to burn the ash and pour bittern, and use fermented porridge as wine, stick eighty." Xu Ke, "Clean Barnyard Banknotes." Seasonal category. "The New Year in the Palace of Xiaoqin": "There is a special room for making cakes. The eunuch preliminarily uses rice flour and white sugar as a dough. The method of preparation is similar to that of steamed buns, and the tomb is raised when it is steamed."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " unitary ", " filial piety " sound. The original meaning is wine yeast, and later refers to yeast.
humanum_full_description:
從「酉」，「孝」聲。本義是酒酵，後泛指酵母。《廣韻．郊韻》：「酵，酒酵。」如《齊民要術．養羊》：「作馬酪酵法：用驢乳汁二三升，和馬乳，不限多少。澄酪成，取下澱，團，曝乾。後歲作酪，用此為酵也。」《本草綱目．穀部．造釀類．蒸餅》：「小麥麵修治食品甚多，惟蒸餅其來最古，是酵糟發成單麵所造，丸藥所須，且能治疾，而本草不載，亦一缺也。」

　　「酵」也表示發酵。《正字通．酉部》：「酵，以酒起麫曰發酵。」如《金史．食貨志四》：「若刮鹻土煎食之，採黃穗草燒灰淋鹵，及以酵粥為酒者，杖八十。」徐珂《清稗類鈔．時令類．孝欽后宮中之歲暮新年》：「製糕有專室，太監預以米粉白糖酵和為團，製法與饅首略同，蒸之即墳起。」
humanum_short_description: 從「酉」，「孝」聲。本義是酒酵，後泛指酵母。

酵字的基本解释

酵
jiào
有机物由于某些菌或酶而分解称“发酵”。能使有机物发酵的真菌称“酵母菌”。亦称“酵母”、“酿母”。

酵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
［《廣韻》古孝切，去效，見。］
(1)含有酵母的有机物，用作发面、制酱、酿酒等。
(2)发酵。

酵字的英文翻译

◎ 酵
ferment, leaven

酵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　酵； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1283第12
【廣韻】古孝切【集韻】居效切，?音敎。【廣韻】酒酵。【集韻】酒滓。【正字通】以酒母起麪曰發酵，蕭子顯《齊書》：永明九年正月詔太廟四時祭薦宣皇帝起麪餠。註：發酵也。韋巨源食單，有婆羅門輕高麪，今俗籠蒸饅頭發酵浮起者是也。金天曆元年有額外課，其十八曰酵。泰和四年定糟酵錢。遼元志有酵課。

酵字的源字形

酵字的起名意思

暂无。

yeast
Basic explanation of words
yeast
jiào
The decomposition of organic matter due to certain bacteria or enzymes is called "fermentation". The fungus that can ferment organic matter is called "yeast". Also known as "yeast" and "young mother".
yeast
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
["Guangyun" Gu Xiaoqie, go to effect, see. ]
(1) Organic matter containing yeast is used for pasta, sauce making, wine making, etc.
(2) Fermentation.
yeast
English translation of words
◎ Yeast
ferment, leaven
yeast
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [You Word Department] 　 Yeast; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1283 No. 12
[Guangyun] Gu Xiaoqie [Jiyun] Effectively cut, sound. [Guangyun] Wine yeast. [Ji Yun] Jiu Chuan. [Zhengzitong] Starting from the mother of wine, it is said to be fermented. Xiao Zixian's "Book of Qi": In the first month of the ninth year of Yongming, Emperor Xuan's four o'clock sacrifices to the Emperor Xuan's face. Note: Fermentation also. Wei Juyuan’s food list includes Brahman light noodles, and the common steamed buns are fermented and floated. There is an extra lesson in the first year of the Jintianli calendar, the eighteenth of which is yeast. Taihe decided to leave money for four years. There is a yeast class in Liaoyuan Chronicles.

Name meaning
Nothing.
酵
形声字。酉表意,西是酒的本字,表示酵是酒酵;孝(xido)表声,孝有给长辈温暖意,表示保持温暖才能发酵成
酒。本义是酒酵。引申指发酵。
发酵,有机物由于受到某些真菌或酶的作用而分解:~母|
jiào
~子。
~母 ~素 ~子 发~ 引~
酵
|酵
дрожжи
Пиктофонетические символы.
«Ты» означает «вино» на западе, что означает, что дрожжи - это винные дрожжи; сыновнее почтение (xido) означает, что сыновнее почтение согревает старейших и означает согревание вина.
Первоначальное значение - винные дрожжи.
Расширение относится к брожению.
Ферментация, органические вещества разлагаются под действием определенных грибов или ферментов: ~ мать | ~ сын.
~ Мать ~ Овощ ~ Детские волосы ~ Введение ~
дрожжи
| Дрожжи
jiào
винные дрожжи; закваска
酵课 акциз на дрожжи (дин. Юань)
Radicals: 酉, 孝  (alcohol, teacher)
Meaning Mnemonic
Alcohol is a good teacher on the process of fermentation.
Because alcohol is so good and addicting, people will work extra hard to ferment it properly. This makes it a good teacher to learn about fermentation. People are motivated to figure it out!
Reading Mnemonic
Using fermentation, you are indeed making some alcohol. It will be drunk at a party put on by Emperor こういち.
You are fermenting thousands of bottles of alcohol for Emperor こういち's big party.
